title: River
description: Does she have a secret life? One even SHE doesn't know about?Seventeen-year-old River has always felt like she doesn't belong. It doesn't help that she sees a light around people that reveals their true nature. When a new kid shows up at school who she can't read, something inside her breaks open, unleashing a wave of raw emotion and faint visions of an emerald-eyed boy that she doesn’t remember. Soon, River’s world changes and everything she thought was real fades away. Taken from the life she knows, River is forced into a dangerous, beautiful world that has been impatiently awaiting her return.
author: Ryen Lesli
